name: Cane
specifications: Fixed or adjustable aluminum or wooden shaft; rubber tip; ergonomic handle; typical length 80â€“100 cm.
function: Assists patients with mild mobility or balance issues during walking.
usage: Select appropriate height; instruct patient to hold the cane on their strong side; move cane forward as the patient steps with their weak leg.
maintenance: Check for cracks or loose parts; replace rubber tip periodically; clean regularly.
warning: Using the cane on the wrong side or setting incorrect height, which can lead to poor posture or instability.
